pages.text: $(li)Crabs can be found in Beaches of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop Crab Legs or Crab Shells on death.$(br)$(li)Crabs can be bred with Wheat, Chicken or any kind of Fish.
$(li)If a near Jukebox it's playing a music disc near of a Crab, it will start dancing to the rhythm of the music.
